title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1499/97 of 29 July 1997 amending for the second time Regulation (EC) No 913/97 adopting exceptional support measures for the pigmeat market in Spain
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1499/97 of 29 July 1997 amending for the second time Regulation (EC) No 913/97 adopting exceptional support measures for the pigmeat market in Spain
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
However, point 3 of Article 1 shall apply with effect from 16 July 1997.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
